hero.title: Founded in Chicago in 1997
hero.description: Founded in Chicago in 1997, the company became a leader in new home construction and home remodeling through a commitment to quality craftsmanship. See the Projects page for the full list of projects.

essence.title: Customer-first philosophy
essence.text: We are guided by a customer-first philosophy and are committed to outstanding workmanship, excellent service, and complete customer satisfaction on every project.

essence.title: Craftsmanship & scope
essence.text: Expertise includes custom kitchens and bathrooms, all types of flooring, and a full range of exterior work.

essence.title: Efficiency & lighting
essence.text: We provide energy-efficient solutions and LED lighting as part of our remodeling services.

teamDescription: Founded by Robert Siska, the company and its dedicated team provide exceptional service built on experience, integrity, superior craftsmanship, and strong customer relationships.

team.subtitle: With over 30 years of experience and a strong background in business and management, Robert and his team take pride in delivering complete customer satisfaction on every project, big or small.

teamMembers.name: Robert Siska
teamMembers.bio: With over 30 years of experience and a strong background in business and management, Robert and his team take pride in delivering complete customer satisfaction on every project, big or small.

teamMembers.name: Erick Bonilla
teamMembers.bio: Project Manager with several years of experience managing projects in California, responsible for coordinating work and ensuring construction quality.

historyIntro: Throughout our history, our customer base has grown primarily through repeat clients, referrals, and long-term satisfaction with our work.

history.title: Founded in Chicago
history.description: Founded in Chicago in 1997, the company quickly became a leader in new home construction and home remodeling through a commitment to quality craftsmanship.

history.title: Expanded to Southern California
history.description: In 2019 the company expanded to Southern California while continuing to serve customers throughout the Chicagoland area.

history.title: Our commitment
history.description: We are committed to outstanding workmanship, excellent service, and complete customer satisfaction on every project.
